alert.note: Alert for Sanilac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sanilac County through 730 PM EDT... At 623 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marlette, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sandusky around 650 PM EDT. Argyle around 710 PM EDT. Deckerville around 720 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Tyre, Decker, Palms, McGregor, Minden, Snover, Juhl, Elmer, Richmondville and Watertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
